alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:14AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Garfield and Wheeler Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 314 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from 7 miles southeast of Bartlett to 8 miles north of Fort Hartsuff State Park. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burwell, Bartlett, Ericson, Deverre, Pibel Lake State Recreation Area and Gables. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
